english: I'll be sittin' out here.
japanese: [おいら]、ここでおすわりしてるよ

definitions: 一幅[いっぷく] (n) (a) scroll
一服[いっぷく] (n, vs) (a) dose, (a) puff, (a) smoke, lull, short rest
一腹[いっぷく] (n) one litter, one clutch (e.g. eggs)
english: I'm gonna have a smoke out here!
japanese: ここで[いっぷく]してるぜ！

definitions: 真っ白[まっしろ] (adj-na, adj-no, n) pure white,blank (e.g. mind, paper)
english: Everything is white…
japanese: [まっしろ]だ……

definitions: 都[みやこ] (n) capital, metropolis, seat of government,capital (of music, fashion, etc.), city (e.g. of light),location of the Imperial Palace
都[と] (n, adj-no) metropolitan, municipal
english: This forest leads to the City of the Ancients… and is called the Sleeping Forest.
japanese: この森は【古代種の[都]】へつづく……【眠りの森】と呼ばれている

definitions: 地層[ちそう] (n) stratum, geological formation, layer, bed (coal, gravel, etc.)
english: [Empty Entry]
japanese: 万年前の[地層]

definitions: 尚更[なおさら] (adv) still more, even more, all the more,still less, even less
english: Then we must go. What'll we do if something happens to AERIS? If Sephiroth finds her, she's in trouble.
japanese: それなら[なおさら]よ。AERISにもしものことがあったらどうするの？セフィロスが気づいたら大変よ

definitions: 抱える[かかえる] (v1, vt) to hold or carry under or in the arms,to have (esp. problems, debts, etc.),to employ, to engage, to hire
english: I know you got problems… Hell, we all do. But you don't even understand yourself.
japanese: おまえはよ、なるほどいろんな間題を[抱え]てるんだろうさ。自分のことよくわかんねえんだもんな

definitions: 下車[げしゃ] (n, vs) alighting (from train, bus, etc.), getting off
english: But you gotta understand that there ain't no gettin' offa this train we're on, till we get to the end of the line.
japanese: でもよ、CLOUD。オレたちが乗っちまったこの列車はよ、途中[下車]はナシだぜ

definitions: 唾壷[だこ] (n) spittoon
english: People get depressed in life because they don't know what's up.
japanese: 誰だって、わけわかんねえからあ～[だこ]～だ、なやむんだろ？

definitions: 至る[いたる] (v5r, vi) to arrive at (e.g. a decision), to reach (a stage), to attain,to lead to (a place), to get to,in the extreme case of,to come, to arrive, to result in
english: Either way, if you stay around here all you're gonna do is worry about it.
japanese: ま、どっちにしても、ここに[いたっ]てなやんで頭かかえてるしかねえぞ
